text:
@CBSNews Coronavirus ain’t got shit on poverty.

Approximately 133,000 deaths were due to individual-level poverty, 119,000 to income inequality, and 39,000 to area-level poverty.  

Overall, 4.5% of U.S. deaths were found to be attributable to poverty.

https://t.co/Y9xDS1JmzU
